high_value_lead_1.description: Enterprise CTO with high revenue - Should score >= 75% and send email to sales agent

lead_data.Title: Chief Technology Officer
lead_data.Description: We are expanding our manufacturing facilities and need industrial network infrastructure. Budget approved for Q2 2024. Looking for switches, cables, and network management solutions. We have 3 facilities that need to be connected.

high_value_lead_2.description: VP Engineering from Financial Services - Should score >= 60% and send email

lead_data.Title: VP of Engineering
lead_data.Description: We need to upgrade our network infrastructure for our new data center. Looking for reliable industrial switches and fiber optic cables. Timeline: Q3 2024.

medium_value_lead.description: Director from mid-market company - Should score 45-59%, no email

lead_data.Title: Director of IT
lead_data.Description: We are evaluating network solutions for our office expansion.

low_value_lead.description: Small business owner - Should score < 45%, route to nurture

lead_data.Title: Owner
lead_data.Description: Just looking for some basic networking equipment.

healthcare_lead.description: Healthcare CTO - High value, should send email

lead_data.Title: Chief Technology Officer
lead_data.Description: We are building a new hospital wing and need industrial-grade network infrastructure that meets healthcare compliance standards. Need switches, cables, and network management software. Budget: $2M approved.

product_switch_complaint.description: Switch product complaint - Should go to Product Expert

case_data.Subject: Hirschmann Switch Keeps Restarting
case_data.Description: Our Hirschmann industrial switch has been restarting every 2-3 hours for the past week. This is affecting our production line. We've tried power cycling but the issue persists. The switch is model RS20-0800T1T1SDAEHC. This is urgent as it's impacting our operations.

product_cable_complaint.description: Cable product complaint - Should go to Product Expert

case_data.Subject: Fiber Optic Cable Defective
case_data.Description: The fiber optic cable we purchased last month is not working correctly. The connector seems loose and we're experiencing signal loss. Product SKU: FO-1234-50M. We need a replacement or refund.

product_connector_complaint.description: Connector product complaint - Should go to Product Expert

case_data.Subject: Connector Not Fitting Properly
case_data.Description: The RJ45 connectors we received don't fit our patch panel. They seem to be slightly out of spec. We ordered 100 units and none of them work. This is delaying our installation project.

product_software_complaint.description: Software product complaint - Should go to Product Expert

case_data.Subject: Network Management Software Bug
case_data.Description: The latest firmware update for our network management software has a critical bug. The dashboard crashes when we try to view device status. Version 2.3.1. We need a hotfix urgently.

it_support_portal.description: IT support - Portal access issue - Should go to Services Agent

case_data.Subject: Cannot Access Customer Portal
case_data.Description: I cannot log into the customer portal. My password doesn't work and the password reset link is not being sent to my email. I've tried multiple times. My account email is customer@example.com.

it_support_password.description: IT support - Password reset - Should go to Services Agent

case_data.Subject: Forgot My Password
case_data.Description: I forgot my password for the support portal. The password recovery system is not working. I need help accessing my account.

it_support_vpn.description: IT support - VPN configuration - Should go to Services Agent

case_data.Subject: Need Help Configuring VPN
case_data.Description: I need assistance setting up VPN access to download software updates. Can someone guide me through the process?

general_product_inquiry.description: General product inquiry (not IT) - Should go to Product Expert by default

case_data.Subject: Product Information Request
case_data.Description: I would like to know more about your industrial switches. What models do you have available? What are the specifications? Do you have any documentation I can review?

general_question.description: General question (not IT, not specific product) - Should go to Product Expert by default

case_data.Subject: Pricing Information
case_data.Description: I'm interested in your network solutions. Can you provide pricing information for a medium-sized installation? We're planning a new office building.

urgent_product_issue.description: Urgent product issue - Should go to Product Expert with high urgency

case_data.Subject: URGENT: Production Line Down Due to Network Failure
case_data.Description: Our entire production line is down because the network switch failed. This is costing us thousands per hour. We need immediate support. The switch is a Hirschmann RS30 model. Please send a technician or replacement immediately.
